RHighlight.p: Villa Cendrawasih is in a great location for the beach, and offers loads of stylish space. The upstairs roof terrace is a sweet spot for evening cocktails, with its sunset views and glimpses of the sea, the rooftops and some of Petitenget’s last remaining paddy fields.

RSurroundArea.p:
If you enjoy the beach, shopping, dining, nightlife and spas, Petitenget is the area to be. From the villa’s gate, a 900m lane brings you onto Jalan Petitenget and the marvellous Sarong restaurant (booking in advance is essential). Within a kilometre, you’ll find numerous other restaurants, including Merah Putin for upmarket Indonesian cuisine, Bonita for a cheap and cheerful selection of Indonesian dishes, Mantra for vegetarian and seafood menus, Dahana offering Japanese cuisine, Biku offering Asian delights, the famous Ku De Ta and Potato Head beach clubs, the hip W Retreat with a choice of fine dining restaurants and wonderful Sunday brunches, and the long-established beachside restaurant La Lucciola.
Petitenget Beach is the northern extension of the sweeping Seminyak Beach, offering awesome sunset views and wonderful walks in both directions all the way to Kuta or Canggu, complemented by the many beachside cafes and restaurants en route. For nightlife check out Mint, and for shopping there are numerous boutiques within walking distance and beyond. The nearby Pepito’s supermarket is good for provisioning and ATMs are close and easy to find. The beach is good for people watching, walking, surfing, chilling out on sunbeds or swimming between the flags in the areas patrolled by lifeguards. The shops offer a diverse choice of products ranging from furniture and homewares to designer clothing and gourmet foods. For horse lovers, the Bali Equestrian Centre is just a few kilometres away, and Nirwana Golf Course – designed by Greg Norman and renowned as one of the best golf courses in Asia – lies 17 kilometres to the west, beside the waved-lashed sea temple of Tanah Lot.

ROverallComments.p:
This is a very classy contemporary-styled villa that truly represents luxurious modern Bali living, and fits perfectly into its fashionable neighbourhood. Villa Cendrawasih was only three months old at the time of our visit (August 2013) and we were very impressed by the high quality of its fixtures, fittings and furnishings. It’s a 900m walk from Jalan Petitenget’s shops and restaurants but only 400m from the beach. We liked the fact that the huge living and dining room could either be open to the pool and garden or closed off and air-conditioned, something that many villas don’t offer their guests: while visitors from colder lands might relish Bali’s balmy nights, those less enthused by an equatorial climate may not, so it’s nice to have the option.
We can recommend heading down to the beach (along the secret passageway) for sunset drinks – a Bali ritual for residents and visitors alike. Not only is it very relaxing but it’s also a great way to meet and have a chat with fellow holidaymakers.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: The villa is only a short walk from the beach but it is quite a slog back up to the main road (900m) where all the best restaurants, bars and shops are located, so it’s best to get the villa staff to order a taxi if you’re heading out after dark. Unfortunately, at the time of our visit there was a noisy construction site next door (scheduled for completion in 2014). You may want to check on the current situation at the time of booking.

REVIEW.Name: Angela Foulds
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay at Villa Cendrawasih was excellent especially with a large group of friends. We spent most of the days at the villa enjoying the pool area and then going upstairs to the rooftop for sunset cocktails - was gorgeous! ALL of the staff were so friendly and accommodating to our requests and the Chef's food was delicious. We were all very sad to be leaving and will definitely look to stay there again at our next visit. THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

REVIEW.Name: Tim Bye
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I would be very grateful if could pass on our sincerest thanks to the senior management at Elite Havens. I understand Mr Robert has retired, so whoever is now the new boss, please let him or her know that we had an amazing time at Villa Cendrawasih. All this was made possible by the very talented and fantastic staff at the villa, lead by Mr Dudu, Ibu Wayan, Landu, Yasa, Bagus and of course chef. No request was too big and the staff went out of their way to ensure we received every comfort and attention. We will be sure to again stay at Villa Cendrawasih and of course will inform all our friends about the wonderful villa, and encourage them to stay there when holidaying in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Company The Private
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing Villa!. Thank you to all the staff for their wonderful hospitality. We have had a fantastic holiday. Cheers

REVIEW.Name: Yunida Yunida
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My favourite place to stay in Bali. Thank you for serving us!

REVIEW.Name: Aleisha Van Bruchem
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This has been the best family holiday, All of the staff were fantastic, the villa was amazing, will come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Queen Crisologo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Food was superb. How we wish we were able to stay longer. There's a private beach access and the staff are brilliant.

REVIEW.Name: Cathy Helder
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for relaxing, perfect holiday. Everyday you all made our holiday extra special. See you next time!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Retreats Bali Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A Big Big thank you to all of the lovely staff who made our stay so incredible. We all enjoyed ourselves so much and hope to be back.

REVIEW.Name: Menno Baks
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for making our stay in this wonderful villa so enjoyable!. We made a very nice day trip to some highlight of Bali, which was perfectly arranged. Also, the food was delicious. We hope to come back some day!

REVIEW.Name: Kaye Manning
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing stay. We loved the villa... great pool and rooms. The staff were so polite and kind. Driver fantastic.We will recommend to our friends and hope we can come back soon. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the awesome stay. Everything was perfect. Great rooms loved the open/enclosed living area. The staff were very nice and accommodating. Thank you so much!

REVIEW.Name: Yunida Yunida
REVIEW.ROverallComments: So glad to be back. The most beautiful villa in Bali. We love the food and the bedrooms.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Je t'aime
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent 2 awesome weeks here, very nice staff, polite, helpful. Thank you to Villa Cendrawasih staff. Keep it up guys!

REVIEW.Name: Eileen Erzay
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
I really have to commend Dudu, ,Wayan, Ngurah, Bagus, Yasa and Landu they were amazing. There was nothing they would not do for us especially Bagus who stayed long after he was meant to go home just to make sure everything went well.
The rooms are huge and very comfortable. It's only a few minutes walk to the beach and with W and Potato Head with in ten minutes walk.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Dudu + everyone at Cendrawasih. Thank you for looking after us so well. It was lovely to meet you all!. Happy New Year. See you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Mark Solomons
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Well presented and maintained villa with a modern fitout and functional design.
Staff are great and the chefs are top knotch .... one of the best villas for sure!

REVIEW.Name: Stephanie Ruocchio
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you everyone for your hospitality! You guys have been awesome to all of us especially the kids. Hope to see you again one day!

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: 4 familys spend 5 days at Villa Cendrawasih, we all had such a wonderful holiday here. We have to thank you all of the staff for nice and warm and helpful hospitality to us. Everything is perfect to us. Especially the food service is good, we love to stay in the villa all the time. Further, price is very fair and we will love to and expect to come again for holiday.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the yummy food. We have a good time here and we enjoy our holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Felicianna Flugge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Cendrawasih team. It's been so much fun and we loved every minute. Thank you for your hospitality.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, thank you, thank you for such an incredible stay. It was truly unforgettable. Dudu, Wayan, Ngurah, Yasa + Bagus, Landu - you guys have touched our hearts. We absolutely will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Kadina Travel Kadina Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the wonderful staff at Villa Cendrawasih - Thank you for your warm hospitality and kindness during our stay. Our family will return home with kind memories and hope to return to visit soon. Love and best wishes.

REVIEW.Name: Christina Mcfarland
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff at The Villa Cendrawasih was wonderful, they were attentive to all of our requests. We had a great time and would definitely come back.

REVIEW.Name: Chris Sheppard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Villa Cendrawasih Staff - Thank you all for a wonderful 10 days. Dudu your staff were very attentive to all our needs. We look forward to seeing you all again. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Priscillia Pereira
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Awesome!! Thank you. We all (10 of us) had a fabulous time celebrating our Jubilee year! It's wonderful to be greeted by the wonderful staff who had been so gracious and kind.

REVIEW.Name: Lynette Shaw
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the amazing staff at Villa Cendrawasih. Thank you for the fantastic service throughout the 4 days. Everything was perfection and we couldn't ask for a better and more enjoyable stay! We will definitely be back!

REVIEW.Name: Ashish Gupta
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful Staff - Dudu, Landu, Bagus, Wayan and last but not least Chef Dharma - All superb. We had a lovely 12 days with kids and family. Definitely back soon. Well done Villa Cendrawasih.

REVIEW.Name: Yael Kurlansky
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay has been sensational and it would never have been so amazing without your wonderful, friendly, helpful staff. Thank you so very much and we look forward to seeing you all soon. And thanks for the AMAZING party!

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a great experience here in Cendrawasih. The vIlla is huge and well maintained. Definitely will come back again. The staff were nice and always very helpful. Wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Rohan Bartlett
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful holiday in your beautiful villa! Your warmth, care and attention to detail were incredible!

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an awesome stay!

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the amazing staff at Cendrawasih - we have had a wonderful time in Bali, and an even better time at the Villa thanks to you all. You have all been so helpful and joyous and we truly appreciate it. Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is really one of the BEST holidays we have been on. Bali is great but you guys are AMAZING. We will keep coming back as long as you are here. Thank you so much for looking after all of us so well. The food is absolutely delicious (thank you Chef!). Nothing was even too much trouble for you and we will certainly miss you all.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all of The team at Villa Cendrawasih, thank you for a lovely five days. The Villa is superb but your kindness and hospitality was most appreciated. Hopefully we will see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful stay and lovely villa, my wife loved it for her 40th and we had an amazing time with friends. The staff were kind and wonderful. We loved our stay.

REVIEW.Name: Juliet Ward
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for fantastic stay - you have been wonderful. The food and smiles were fabulous!

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for your hospitality and taking such good care of our group. We loved staying at the Villa!!

REVIEW.Name: Claudia Sanchez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to Dudu and the team for looking after our group of 10 this long weekend. The villa is wonderfully designed, we enjoyed the facilities upstairs and downstairs. It was lovely to have a choice of private and common areas. Perfect holiday house!

REVIEW.Name: Harry Wong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic Villa and the best staff ever!. Thank you very much for looking after our families and making it a great holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Business Travel Direct / Ickenham Travel Group
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a great villa to stay. Service is great, Gym is really good. Staffs are really friendly and helpful! Definitely come back!

REVIEW.Name: Anthony Elam
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great house, works perfectly for a group. Good location. Staff is wonderful!! the best in Bali, attentive, prompt, reliable, friendly. Will definitely recommend to all. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villa Worldwide - BVW
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A fantastic Villa & the staff are amazing. We have had a wonderful week and will most certainly return to Villa Cendrawasih.The Best!! Thanks Dudu and staff for an awesome week

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Poon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful memories and personal attentive service! Will be back for sure :)

REVIEW.Name: Kylie Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful time at the villa. The staff were super nice and attentive, attending to our every need. Food was good, better than eating at the restaurant outside. All in all, this is a truly relaxing and nice trip. Thank you. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Camillo Holfert
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an awesome time in Villa Cendrawasih and really enjoyed the whole trip. It was a great experience and I want to thank Dudu and his staff for having us. What a paradise!

REVIEW.Name: Sri Wulansari
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great Villa, Outstanding location, Staff did incredible job!. Hope to come again.

REVIEW.Name: Benito Mable
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful house and location - perfect for our two families and the children. Staff very helpful and pleasant - thank you Dudu and team. Lovely trip.

REVIEW.Name: Claus Plougmand
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for some wonderful days. The staff, food and surroundings were fantastic. We hope to be back.

REVIEW.Name: Sara Rigg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Dudu and the rest of the wonderful people looking after us at Villa Cendrawasih. The villa was perfect for couples and friends - immaculate and beautiful as well and special thank you to villa Chef who prepared us amazing breakfast, lunches and dinners. We will be back - hopefully soon and for much longer!

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank You for all your help, work and service! We had the best + most beautiful time @ this villa

REVIEW.Name: Denny Burhan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all the staff at Cendrawasih Villa, you guys have made our holiday memorable, with all your welcoming senses and smile. Holiday would not be a "Holiday" without your attentive attitude. Many thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Kahini Iyer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay! Amazing villa and amazing staff! Had a great vacation with the whole family.

REVIEW.Name: ICS Travel Group / Biro Perjalanan Wisata Is Indonesia, PT ICS Travel Group / Biro Perjalanan Wisata Is Indonesia, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best vacation ever. Great Villa.

REVIEW.Name: Geralyn Danker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best Villa we ever stayed in Bali. The staff were attentive and professional. They certainly make our 7 days stay much more comfortable than expected. The kids, adults and old will bring back many memories from this stay with Elite Havens. Many terima kasih.

REVIEW.Name: Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT Golden Int'l Travel service / Bali villas.com/ Bali International,. PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for the wonderful service, this is a really really nice villa!. We had an amazing time. I loved my time here and the food was so good. I wish I could have more time here, and i like how nice all of you are. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Annie Piper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Dudu and all the fabulous villa staff. Thank you an incredible week. How do we go back to reality. You have truly looked after us. Thank you for all the delicious food, all of the drinks!. And all of our requests. BEST WEEK, BEST VILLA in BALI. We will be back with husbands and kids (if they survived at home without us).

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Dudu and staff. What a wonderful way to spend a week in Bali. The service was amazing. Thank you for all your wonderful help. To the Chef - yummy, delicious food. You are the best, we are all going home with happy tummy's.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Dudu and all the fabulous staff. We want to thank you for your great service, friendship and organizing everything for us. The food was fantastic. You made our villa experience one to remember. We really enjoyed our time at Villa Cendrawasih and will recommend it to all our friends in Australia. Thank you all.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all of the team here for a wonderful week away!. The pool, the grass, the food, everything was fantastic and the staff here made it all happen and it was never a problem. Looking forward to many more trips here.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our first trip to Bali a wonderful experience. Bali is an easy place to love but you all made it all the most special. We enjoyed getting to know you during our time here and will cherish our memories. We wish you all the best.

REVIEW.Name: Tyson Chewe
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had an absolutely incredible time, staff were extremely helpful, friendly and accommodating and spoke very good English. Villa was better than in photo's, very clean and well maintained. Thank you all the staff and team at Villa Cendrawasih for helping us have an amazing stay.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Absolutely beautiful villa and perfect for our family get together. Staff were so accommodating and made our stay extra special. Wonderful location and will be recommending to all our friends.

REVIEW.Name: Charmain Galipo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, thank you, thank you. For everything. Villa was amazing, stunning gardens, relaxing pool area, spaces incredible, every corner was worth investigating. Divine. Staff were gentle and friendly, constantly keen to help and always happy, such a joy to have around. Food was exceptional, choices were abundant and served each of our needs. Delicious. All our families absolutely loved the stay, it was truly relaxing, it definitely transported us away from our busy lives.

REVIEW.Name: Cindy Chen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Sweetest staff. Villa that feels like home.

REVIEW.Name: Richard Dixon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the team at the Villa, we had a cool time and great stay.

REVIEW.Name: Noviria Kwee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is the second time we stay in the Villa, just like the first time staying, everything was wonderful the staff are all very friendly, great location, great service and very helpful. See you in our next visits.

REVIEW.Name: PT. Immersia Bali Property - Gobalivilla
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to congratulate the team at Villa Cendrawasih for their faultless service, quite simply they become like family and are a credit your establishment. Job well done and a very big thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Tom Hoernemann
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great stay at the villa with our kids. Thanks for the hospitality and care.

REVIEW.Name: Alex Bizon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for the great reception, good food and wonderful service. The staff was so nice and helpful. We had a great time with a good care. We will definitely come back.

REVIEW.Name: Saul Caddy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for having us, it was wonderful!

REVIEW.Name: Sabrina Dommenge
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for making our girls weekend away super relaxing and hassle free. The place is beautiful and everyone has been so helpful. Hope to come back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Cath Godley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dear Dudu and your wonderful team, your hospitality, support and friendship in this beautiful villa has made our holiday a fantastic experience. We were all extremely impressed and will definitely be back. Stay safe and we wish you and your families the very best for the future.

REVIEW.Name: Kenni Adivikasari
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Terima kasih Bli Dudu dan team. Great villa, great service, pegawainya semua sigap kala butuh bantuan. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing experience we have had staying with you. We have been very spoiled, all our needs were met, the food was outstanding, the facilities, service and friendliness of the staff was probably the best we have ever experienced in our travels to date. We will look forward to returning to visit you all again and will definitely recommend Villa Cendrawasih to all our friends and family. Thank you for making this one of the best holidays we have had.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay at Villa Cendrawasih. The combination of friendly and helpful staff and the excellent facilities made our time here extra special.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the moment we arrived we felt like we were in heaven. The staff are friendly, accommodating, funny and so professional. Nothing is too hard and they over delivered every time we asked for something. The villa is beautiful and clean, quiet and located in a perfect spot for access to beach, restaurants and shopping. This was our first trip to Bali and we are already talking about re-booking this villa next year.

REVIEW.Name: Karen Farrell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everyone here has made our stay like a dream. The staff are kind, helpful and keep their guests very happy. The villa is gorgeous and provided everything we needed for the perfect vacation. The only downside is that we all left a bit fatter after eating all of chef Darma's delicious cooking. We will always treasure this vacation for a lifetime.

REVIEW.Name: Belinda Mamet
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your hospitality and for all your support. Our experience at your villa has been outstanding. I was so impressed with the facilities and service by staff. We will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Ryan Middleton
REVIEW.ROverallComments: One word, WOW. We cannot say thank you enough to the beautiful staff who made our stay so memorable. Thanks for the countless beers, late night feeds, laughter, awesome breakfast, cleaning up after us, see you again.

REVIEW.Name: Katrina Redknap
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Dudu, Wayan and all the incredible staff, we cannot thank you enough for everything you all did to make our stay amazing. The food, the service and your wonderful smile have made this one of the best holidays we have had. What an awesome villa.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so much for such a wonderful villa experience. The service was simply amazing and we truly appreciate your warm and kind attention. Thank you for making us feel so at home, we've loved every minute spent here. Definitely will coming back again and again! All the best!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Good overall, satisfying stay, great hospitality.

REVIEW.Name: Helloworld Willetton
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Dudu, Wayan and the rest of the team - thanks for making our stay so wonderful. The food, service and surroundings were exceptional. It was a perfect setting to celebrate Victoria's 50th birthday! The decoration and birthday cake were extra special. We loved the villa and hope to be back again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Ken Choo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing and relaxing stay at your beautiful villa. All of you have been kind, understanding and attentive. You have exceeded our expectations! Thank you also for arranging the decoration for max's 2nd birthday. We took lots of photos and videos and will bring them home with us

REVIEW.Name: Joe Alim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for an amazing stay. Nothing was ever too big of a request. Rarely have we stayed somewhere the staff have been so friendly and eager to help. You've been superb.

REVIEW.Name: Richard Scott Meyrick
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The amazing team of Villa Cendrawasih, thank you for your lovely and thoughtful service. The excellent food and great chef, the helpful assistance you provided us. We had a relaxing and enjoyable time, we did lots of good work and even celebrated a birthday with your help. Hope to see you all gain soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Staff and service is the best. Food is very good as well. Villa is beautiful will be back again next year.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Dudu, Bagus and the Cendrawasih team for another fantastic stay in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Peter Egbertsen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: You are the best. Thanks for all!

REVIEW.Name: Ms.Elly Fryer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Now that we are back in Geneva, I just wanted to thank you SO much for all you did for us during our stay at Villa Cendrawasih. You looked after us so beautifully and gave us such a lovely welcome. Everything was perfectly organized from the airport pickups, wine, massages, dinners, lunches and taxis, we couldn’t have asked for more! Many many thanks to you all and hope to come back again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Galvin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the staff, thank you for your outstanding attention to detail in all of our needs. The food, coffee and cleanliness was truly 5 stars. To relax in less than 24 hours is a big ask and you delivered.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A massive thank you to all of the Cendrawasih staff. Your service and attention to detail exceeded our expectations. I would certainly recommend or stay at this villa again. Thank you for the delicious cocktails, late night feeds, arranging taxi's and massages and for doing everything without fuss. You are all beautiful people, making it a pleasure to stay here.

REVIEW.Name: Gerbang Bali Indonesia, PT.
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing stay, amazing staff, we were very well taken care off. The villa is amazing with great bathrooms. Thank you for an amazing stay.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Dudu and the rest of the team that made our stay here memorable and an extremely pleasant experience. You looked after us tirelessly and the villa itself was outstanding. We had a great time.

REVIEW.Name: Boudewijn Niels
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Dudu, Yasa and all the rest of the wonderful members of the Cendrawasih team - thank you so much for everything. You guys were really great and were a big part of this amazing experience. The Villa was incredible, staying in the heart at Seminyak, while surrounded by only the sound of the birds and water was quite special. Sampai jumpa lagi.

REVIEW.Name: Andrew Simester
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our third visit to Villa Cendrawasih and we keep coming back because the experience is so wonderful for all three generations - grand parents, parents and kids, we all had a wonderful time. The villa is located within a short taxi ride to very nice restaurants and shopping areas. We got to know the staff by name, they are great. The service is excellent and the hospitality is superb. We will be coming back again.

REVIEW.Name: Carmen Egbertsen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our very first visit to Villa Cendrawasih and the experience is absolutly wonderful and satisfactory to everyone in the family. The staff is welcoming and extremely professional, we were very well taken of.
